channel.title: A little command help here
channel.description: Well I was trying to make a ::jail and ::unjail command in which when I type ::jail personsname they would be sent to these coords: 3079,3498; and when they are ::unjail they are sent to 3080,3503... and they would not be able to teleport out, and when they log out and in they are still in jail. Can anyone assist me in this please? I was using it before, but when complied I had like 150 errors. If someone help, I will GLADY appreciate it, and rep you.

item.title: A little command help here
item.dc:creator: @rockyd2 rockyd2
item.description:
@rockyd2 wrote:

Ok kindler, there is was two errors, I fixed the first one but the second one, I have NO CLUE what went wrong here is what I got:

client.java:25059: orphaned case
case 9125: // Accurate
^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2008, 02:40:29 pm[/size][hr]Anyone know what to do? please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2008, 02:48:08 pm[/size][hr]please help?

Read full topic

item.title: A little command help here
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3491; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } } if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3080; c.teleportToY = 3506; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3093; c.teleportToY = 3491; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Ahhh!feel the fresh air!Do not break the rules again!."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Read full topic

item.title: A little command help here
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

[quote=“rockyd2, post:3, topic:236887”]Well my source is 100% fine, it is this im having trouble with. And I ment to say 100[/quote]…Download It, Get The commands Then Do w/e you want with the source…Its Simple.

Read full topic

item.title: A little command help here
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

something along the lines of:

if(command.startsWith("jail"))
{
String[] strings = command.split[" "];

for(Player Player : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(strings[1].equalsIgnoreCase(Player.playerName))
{
Player.absX = 3079;
Player.absY = 3498;
teleblocked = true;
}
}
}

or something along those lines.

Read full topic
